game.name: Bianka Lovesick
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In classic survival horror fashion, you explore many places looking for items in order to advance. Collect Ammo and heal items to increase your chances of surviving this nightmare. Each decision counts, so think twice on which enemy to kill and with what weapon.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In classic survival horror fashion, you explore many places looking for items in order to advance. Collect Ammo and heal items to increase your chances of surviving this nightmare. Each decision counts, so think twice on which enemy to kill and with what weapon.
